message.body: Would you go to a show with me tomorrow night at KFN? It's $8, but I'll buy you a beer. (I'll be in a wheelchair, so that's cool)
What show is it? How long r u here for?

Church shoes. No clue what they are like. They are playing with honey radar, Jowe head. No clue what either of them are like either. Probably punky. A friend that I like from Austin is tour managing them. Mostly I want to see him.Â
I am in town because I was in a motorcycle accident. I broke my leg and am in a wheelchair. I'm at my parents until the end of April.
Oh moe. I'm glad you are in town, but sorry about your wreck. Whether I can come out depends on how much school work I get done during the day. Can I let u know tomorrow?
Yes of course. Good luck with your school work. I'd love it if you could make it, but NBD if you can't.

Hello friends, I was hoping to set up a get together sometime this week before I head back to Austin. Let me know what days are better/worse for you. I was hoping to do some karaoke, or bar trivia, or roller skate. Jk I can't skate!! LOL or maybe a kegger
Also if anyone wants to go to new York on Saturday and drive a cripple to a show in Brooklyn, I'll pay for gas and your time.
